MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA24 postcode area of Dalry, affecting properties on Munnoch Farm and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:15pm due to a damaged electricity pole and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:47pm on Wednesday, 24 February 2021
